titleStmt.title: Christians earnest expectation and longing for the glorious appearing of the great God and our saviour Jesus Christ set forth in a discourse occasioned by the decease of that excellent Christian and minister of Christ Mr. Noah Webb ... / by Daniel Burgess.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Daniel, 1645-1713.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Apocharadochia ch euchē hē chrisianichi.
